name: Ten Second Buff
description:
Sorry I didn't have enough time so you can't respawn. (First Game Jam After All). I also have a white square when you spawn in and that is completely useless. And also if you want to respawn you have to restart the game. (Sorry(Update: You Can now respawn)). Can you please comment if you are allowed to update your game after the deadline.

Meant To be for a Game Jam
